>Effective Team Work

>Shared Goals:
A team needs a clear understanding of the overall objective and how individual contributions fit into overall objective. 

>Accountability and Ownership:
Team member ought to be accountable for their tasks and understand their responsibility. 

>Individual Strengths:
Leveraging the unique skills and talents of each member allows for more efficient and effective work. 
>Conflict Resolution:
Being able to address disagreements constructively and find solutions together is essential. 

>Positive Attitude:
A positive and supportive team environment promotes collaboration and motivation.
